dialogueLines.line: Boyfriend, are you sure this is the right way?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: Yeah, this is the right way...
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Hey, look it's that guy with the hat and that girl with the speakers.
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: Hello again. Do you want to do the spooky dance with us?
dialogueLines.speaker: pump

dialogueLines.line: Oh, uh...sorry. We're just passing by.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Actually, we might be lost. Think you can show us the right way to our destination?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: But only after you sing a song with us.
dialogueLines.speaker: pump

dialogueLines.line: A song for the spooky month!
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: I don't think it's even October right now.
dialogueLines.speaker: gf
